title: Easily Make Amazon Ads for Your Self-Published Book - Publisher Rocket Tutorial
description:
Easily Make Amazon Ads for Your Self-Published Book // In past YouTube videos, I've mentioned how Publisher Rocket is one of my favorite tools to use as a self-published author. Well...it just got better. They recently updated the software to make creating Amazon Ads easier than ever. Anyone who has ever made Amazon ads knows that creating a long list of ad keywords is a process that can sometimes take hours. Well with the new Publisher Rocket update, it will only take minutes. In this video, I'm so excited to be showing you how you can use Publisher Rocket to easily create a list of keywords for your book's Amazon ads.

LINKS MENTIONED IN THIS VIDEO:
Try out Publisher Rocket: https://publisherrocket.cartknox.com/buy-rocket?aff=165
Sign up for the Amazon ads course (free for a limited time): https://mandilynnwrites--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/5da9eae7a2e46/
Watch another tutorial on Publisher Rocket: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C7DJJZWWmzo&t=1s
Read Book Sales That Mult
tags: how to make the best ad campaign
